idea-plugin.name: DevTomcat
idea-plugin.description:
DevTomcat - Enhanced Tomcat Integration

Professional Tomcat plugin bringing Ultimate-like features to IntelliJ Community Edition:

  • Enhanced Deployment Logging - Real-time deployment progress with Ultimate-style messages
  • Intelligent Process Monitoring - Smart log parsing and deployment detection
  • Professional Console Output - Structured logging with timestamps and status indicators
  • Development Mode Optimizations - Hot deployment and enhanced debugging support
  • Multi-Project Support - Spring Boot, Maven, and Gradle project detection

Perfect for JSP, Spring Boot, and enterprise Java development.
